traits.name: Acid Arrow
traits.desc: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) acid damage.

traits.name: Fear
traits.desc: 1d4 targets within 30', 1d4+1 psychic damage and DC 11 versus wisdom or frightened. A frightened creature takes 1d4+1 psychic damage and can save again at the end of each turn.
